message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Hello Alice, thanks for showing me the product. I'm interested but your price is a bit high for me.  Would you consider $80?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $175 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $140 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  However, $140 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend.  How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I understand that $110 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $130 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  My final offer is $105.  If you can't do that, I'll have to go with a different option.
I understand that $105 is your final offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $125 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
